sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-menu-item key="logo">
    <a-icon component="Box" :style="logoStyle">
      <FundOutlined />
      <a-text :style="textStyle">FUNDAPP</a-text>
    </a-icon>
  </a-menu-item>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import { AMenuItem, AIcon, AText } from "ant-design-vue";
import { FundOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons-vue";

export default defineComponent({
  components: {
    AMenuItem,
    AIcon,
    AText,
    FundOutlined,
  },
  computed: {
    logoStyle() {
      return {
        display: "flex",
        alignItems: "center",
        fontSize: "1rem", // You can customize this value
        fontFamily: "Kodchasan",
        fontWeight: "bold",
        color: "var(--color-primary)",
      };
    },
    textStyle() {
      return {
        background:
          "linear-gradient(to right, var(--color-primary) 10%, var(--color-secondary))",
        "-webkit-background-clip": "text",
        color: "transparent",
      };
    },
  },
});
</script>
